job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking a End-to-end Engineer to design, build, and deploy cutting-edge solutions for a client in the financial sector.

   As a End-to-end Engineer, you will collaborate with internal teams and clients to develop innovative solutions. You will be responsible for end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment, ensuring they meet high standards of quality and cost-effectiveness.

   Your Responsibilities:
     * Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
     * Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions.
     * Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
     * Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges.

   Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
     * Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
     * Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board.
job_details.full_text:
End-to-end Engineer

We are seeking a End-to-end Engineer to design, build, and deploy cutting-edge solutions for a client in the financial sector.

   As a End-to-end Engineer, you will collaborate with internal teams and clients to develop innovative solutions. You will be responsible for end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment, ensuring they meet high standards of quality and cost-effectiveness.

   Your Responsibilities:
     * Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
     * Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions.
     * Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
     * Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges.

   Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
     * Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
     * Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing, building, and deploying GenAI solutions, including responsibilities like 'Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions' and 'Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions'. This aligns directly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly the focus on generative models and end-to-end solution delivery.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements' indicates a need to grasp business context and translate it into technical needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions' directly refers to the creation and adaptation of generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop reusable components from the solutions you create' implies building software components as part of the solution delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop reusable components from the solutions you create

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable' covers the full software development lifecycle for AI solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability' points to operational aspects of maintaining and improving deployed solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable' also encompasses the operational aspects of running solutions in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable
